General.Name: Cypress Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Cypress Technology Co.,Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells AV and multimedia products. The company provides matrixes, splitters, switchers, extenders, scalers, video and audio products, control systems, and other products. Its products are primarily designed for signal management for home theater integration, AV signal distribution within mega stores, video production, video picture enhancement or signal format conversion, distribution, and switching. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 130, Jiankang Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23585
